I would recommend this Airbnb to anyone!', '153104905;2017年5月;The apartment was clean and with all the amenities one could wish for. The neighborhood provides all the restaurants one could want...Thai, Korean, Vietnamese and many others. Kowloon City is a real neighborhood district and highly recommend this property to anybody. Bill is a fantastic host!
', '151251111;2017年5月;感謝Bill提供這麼好的房源跟超棒的服務,有吃有喝還有網路,讓我這幾天在香港真的是有吃有玩~,下次還要再來香港叨擾Bill了,陽台也很大,真的可以坐一下,放鬆一下,Bill的家人也很親切,謝謝Bill', '149994576;2017年5月;Bill is very committed to his clients and tries to make everything easy. One of the most useful things is the 3g phone provided at home.
The apartment itself is pretty basic and stretch for 2 tall people but cozy at the same time. The location is ok if you wanna explore Kowloon, but for HK Island is a bit far away and you need about 45 mins to cross by bus and ferry. We didnt feel like being in HK but so deep in Kowloon ( where the studio actually is). If you want to be close to the big buildings zone this is not the place to be, as it is located in a very local neighbourhood with lot of small streets.', "149361239;2017年5月;I have stayed at several Air BnBs and by far Bill has been the best host. 
We were greater on the day of our arrival by Bill and taken to a Dim Sum lunch which was so lovely, Bill gave advice on how to get around Hong Kong as well as destinations for us to check out during our stay.

The apartment itself is cosy, clean and has anything you would need during your holiday. We were very impressed with the level of organisation that has gone into the apartment with guides of getting around Hong Kong, places to eat and see. Bill even had print outs with the address in Cantonese to give to the taxi drivers if we are unable to communicate or got lost. 

Location wise, the apartment is situated close to restaurants and a shopping centre as well as a 10minute walk to the subway or close to the bus stop if walking is not your thing. We were very happy with the location as could also venture to the several beautiful parks close by. 

After our fantastic stay at Bill's apartment during our holiday I would recommend staying at Bill's apartment to any visitor to Hong Kong.  ", '146854430;2017年4月;Great host! Highly recommended. Even though he was not in HK during my stay, he was quick to respond my queries via messages. ', "145367243;2017年4月;Bill is definitely the best airbnb host we have ever had. We are super hosts but Bill is a SUPER host!!

The apartment is compact but Bill has thought of everything from instant oats, coffee, snacks, drinks, toothbrush, razor, slippers, etc. The aircon is great as well! The balcony makes the place twice the size and is great for breakfast. The location is excellent! we loved being in Kowloon which gives you a more real life experience but it's close enough on the bus to the ferry and to Hong Kong island.

Bill is a wonderful host, is always accessible and even provides a cell phone with data that you can use to keep in touch and find your way around. Bill loves interacting with his guests and he even kindly took us for breakfast on our first morning and refused to let us pay. He provides lots of itineraries for the city and information to help you make the most of your time in Hong Kong.

Highly highly recommended!", "144167778;2017年4月;Jon and myself had a great time and stay at Bill's place. ', '142598903;2017年4月;Lovely host and a great place to stay ', "141609622;2017年4月;Although the flat was in a lively neighborhood at Kowloon City,we didn't hear a noise in our sleep. The bed and pillows were really comfortable. The place made us feel like home, even though it was small. The space basically reflected the character of its hosts, warm and truly Asian!", '139169547;2017年3月;介紹房子的說明,非常符合實際情況,我喜歡像家一樣舒適的生活環境', '138082537;2017年3月;bill은 진짜 상상 그 이상으로 친절하구요. 피드백도 빠르고 문제가 생기면 정말 친절하고 빠르게 해결해줘요.', '135732318;2017年3月;Bill은 정말 멋진 Host였어요 
많은 질문에도 모두 친절하게 대답하였으며 제 일정까지 꼼꼼하게 체크하며 조정해 주었어요 덕분에 생각지도 못한 멋진 곳들까지 여행할 수 있어 너무 좋았어요

어디를 가든 현지인들의 생활 속으로 들어가기 좋아하는 저희는 숙소의 위치가 바로 저희가 딱 원하는 곳이었어요
주변에 많은 식당과 시장 그리고 어디를 가든 도로가 사통팔달로 연결되어 있어  정말 편리했어요

숙소 안에는 많은 간식들이 비치되어 있었고 생필품들이 아주 풍족하게 갖춰져 있어 집주인의 세심한 배려가 느껴졌어요
베란다가 있어 식사도 하고 간식도 먹으며 분위기 있는 멋진 시간도  가질 수 있어 여행의 힐링을 제대로 느낄 수 있었어요 

답답한 호텔보다 더 훌륭하다고 느낄 만큼 아주 만족스러운 곳이었어요
덕분에 멋진 추억을 더 많이 담아갑니다
다음 홍콩 여행 때도 꼭 다시 이곳으로 할 거예요 

Bill是最好的房東,我問什麼他很熱情的回答,又給我安排旅遊日程,由他我去欣賞我沒想過的地方｡
平時我們去哪個國家,愛看當地人的生活樣子,宿舍周圍有很多餐廳和市場,就是我們喜歡的地方｡
公路四通八達,交通很方便,所以我們能隨便去所有的地方｡
宿舍裡面有很多的零食,生活用品全準備,我能看到房東的體貼｡
這個宿舍裡有陽台,我們在那裡吃飯和點心,讓我們很舒服｡
我們覺得這個宿舍比酒店更好｡
這次我們享受好美的回憶,下次我去香港的話,再想去找這裡｡
Bill,謝謝你｡

', "134921850;2017年3月;Bill has helped us plan every detail of our trip, there was no wasted time trying to navigate or look for the location of the tourists spot cause he'll give you directions and tips on how to get there.
Bill is most helpful and the place is perfect! 
The apartment is relatively small which is typical in Hong Kong but you'll have everything that you need, there's snacks, coffee, complete beddings, etc., everything that you need to make you feel like you never left home.
The nearby food shops are also great, you can dine or buy some local bread. 15mins walk to MTR station and walking distance to bus stops.
We did not have the chance to meet in person cause we were also always out but he made sure we've got everything we need to enjoy our trip.
My husband and I can't thank him enough for helping us make our anniversary the most memorable one.
We will definitely stay again when we come back in HK!", "132666481;2017年2月;Bill's studio is an excellent value.  The studio is self contained and well stocked with many amenities you do not normally expect for vacation rentals.  The unit is sufficient for couples.  Some may find it a little small but this is HK where real estate is one of the, if not the most, expensive in the world.

Bill is great host where he makes sure everything is fine when you check in and during our visit.

The provided smartphone with hotspot was a great tool in getting your own mobile devices connected while in HK.

Due to the major construction of a new MTR station currently underway in the neighborhood you may want to consider taking a taxi from the airport to Bill's place if you are not familiar with the area.", '131321741;2017年2月;非常讚的host! Fantastic!房間很寬敞很舒適,備品應有盡有,而且房間很乾淨｡是我住過airbnb以來最棒的經驗｡Bill是個熱情又盡責的host,由於這次男友腳受傷行走不便,Bill給了我們非常多的幫忙,而且旅遊期間還常常關心詢問我們的狀況,真的感激不盡,很幸運這次能夠住到Bill的房子,九龍城附近的生活機能很棒,完全在香港留下了很好的印象跟美好的旅遊經驗,非常希望有天也能在台灣招待Bill一家人,非常推薦!', "130169262;2017年2月;Overall, my husband and myself enjoyed our stay at Bill's place. It is good for couples or family of 3 (kids < 5yrs old). 
Plenty of restaurants, cafes and minimarts around the corner. Bus stop is around 5mins walking distance (at opposite side of the main road), which brings you to the places like MongKok. Alternatively, you might consider to take a slow walk during autumn/winter season when the weather is cooling. It takes about 15-20 mins to MongKok/Prince. 
Will definitely recommend Bill's place to friends.", '129629899;2017年2月;친구랑 처음으로 같이한 해외여행이라 긴장도 하고 영어가 서툴러 걱정했지만 말도 잘 안통하는 저희에게 웃으며 이것저것 가르쳐주신 Bill에게 너무 감사했습니다. 숙소는 아늑하고 따뜻한 느낌이 들었고 전반적으로 깔끔했습니다. 숙박3일동안 숙소에 있는 시간이 짧아 테라스를 이용하지 못한게 너무 아쉬웠습니다. 다음 홍콩 여행때도 다시 한번 더 가고 싶은 숙소였습니다.', '128846807;2017年1月;집은 아주 청결하고 배려심과 정성이 담긴 흔적들이 보였어요. 수건은 아주 많이 있고 일회용 칫솔들과 샤워용품 등 간단한 먹거리도 많이 있어요. 저희가 너무 많이 먹은거 같아서 죄송하기도 ㅎ.ㅎ.. 주변에 버스정류장이 많아서 침사추이 몽콕도 쉽게 갔다올 수 있어요. 위치상으로도 만족했구 빌과 연락도 잘돼서 편안한 여행할 수 있었어요 :) ', "127928343;2017年1月;When you read the reviews here you get a sense that Bill is a legend and we can confirm it is all true. The apartment is very well stocked and laid out - it makes the most of its size, with a lovely outside area to sit and relax. Bill made contact very early on and provided loads of information on the area, places to see, possible itineraries and other suggestions. We really enjoyed Kowloon City for its food and Bill's recommendations were spot on. It was easy to communicate and get advice and tips and while we didn't manage to meet Bill this time, it will definitely happen in future. After having stayed in different Hong Kong places of accommodation over the years, this is our favourite by far and we will book this apartment again when we return. Highly recommended if you want good local insight, a personal touch with your accommodation and very good value for money.", "127396119;2017年1月;Bills place is located about a km from mongkok and is easily accessible by public bus while being in a residential area away from the chaotic city center. There's great food in the vicinity with some real hidden gems. PS there's a teahouse (awesome eggs) nearby which is on par w the Australian Diary Company.  

Bills place is clean, well organised with a large patio. It even has a fully furnished kitchen which is stocked with plenty of tidbits. All the essentials such as toothbrush, shavers, toilet paper, towels are available.  Bill even provided a phone and powerbank which were really useful. 

Although he could not check us in personally, his sister Daisy was there to assist us.  Even though Daisy did not speak fluent English, we had no problems understanding her. There's an instruction booklet available to orientate guests. 

Overall, one of my best airbnb experiences. :) ", "127298574;2017年1月;All the glowing reviews about Bill as a host and his terrific little apartment are accurate.  Yes, the place is small but it works because of the layout and how every detail has been tended to.  It's well equipped with everything you will need, including lots of toiletries and snacks.  The deck is big and private and, although we did not make too much use of it, it makes the place seem bigger.  This apartment was home for me and my wife (we are seniors) for a week and we loved it.  Kowloon City is the place to stay in Hong Kong.  You will feel like a local and at night the place comes alive with neon lights.  Very convenient to local transit, including the A22 bus to the airport.
Bill himself is a wonderful host.  He met us at the apartment to give us an orientation and then took us by taxi to see a nearby temple.  On our last day he accommodated our special request without any fuss.  A top host.
We highly recommended Bill's apartment as an affordable, comfortable and convenient place to stay in Hong Kong.", '126073290;2017年1月;No wonder Bill is a super host! He gives more than anyone can offer. And he is super efficient from getting the room ready, the extra phone that we can use among others. Would definitely come back to his!', '125632078;2017年1月;Bill is a fantastic host - the best we have so far in Airbnb  The flat is beyond our expectation. It's cosy, compact, well-utilized in space and a very comfy sweet home. We love the patio, the size is even bigger than the flat itself and at night when the candles light up, it creates an additional romance, too.
Location is perfect - 24/7 running mini bus, metro, standby taxi, all major double deck bus will take you anywhere you want to go in HK. And Bill is ready to answer any questions you may have.
Proximity - mins of walking distance to the most famous Kowloon city wall, the park, the market, the hundreds of restaurants and eateries, the old airport impression, and the very warm hearted people who have lived here for the last decades ready to answer any of your "touristed" questions - we felt in love with this particular part of HK.
Best host ever! - Bill thought of everything we may need during our stay, we got everything sorted out by Bill just like in a hotel and more - we got a full equipped flat with channel TV, high speed wifi, well stocked toiletries, fresh towels, a kitchen conveniently to make full meals with dishes and cutlery, sodas & beer stored full in the fridge, and plenty of snacks for us to enjoy - Bill is so attentive that he even left us a mobile phone to use in HK for local calls and roaming wifi, and he prepared the instruction so that we could easily port our smart device with his phone to stay connected, when we have our day trip, considering the high power consumption he even gave us an extra power bank! How thoughtful can that be? Furthermore he left us a bowl of coins for us to buys bus tickets in case we run out of small money and an octopus card for us to swipe in case we don't have one - we felt absolutely touched for all the convenient details that Bill provided during our stay!
we are so happy with Bill and his place we are already looking into our next return trip staying with Bill again. Bill, all we can say is: Come visit us in Frankfurt please! We just want to return the hospitality soon! Thank you sooooo much!!!', '124866651;2017年1月;第一次使用airbnb訂房其實有些擔心,很害怕被臨時取消呢!
到Bill家住了三天,覺得很舒適､真的很放鬆!附近有很多巴士及餐廳,最重要的是有兩間超市在附近~去看演唱會(紅館)交通也非常方便喔!
希望之後去香港還有機會能入住這裡:)', '122075967;2016年12月;Bill房東很熱情和nice,提供的信息也很足夠｡很有人情味,房間裡的儲備超多,廚房廚具,杯麵,小零食,茶和咖啡包,充滿各種用得到用不到,以及房東覺得你可能用得到的東西｡房裡空間的利用很棒,也很乾淨｡室外還有一個和房間大小差不多的陽台(超誇張),也可以出去晃晃,晚上點上蠟燭有氛圍｡有準備dvd,想在房裡頹一天都可以,比較可惜是我們這次都安排了出去玩,沒能在房裡看電影hea一下~住了不會後悔的房間,推薦^_^', '121947244;2016年12月;房東很', '121173199;2016年12月;A very quaint home. ', '74059890;2016年5月;Bill was very friendly, and the place was very well-stocked and clean. It was comfortable and as described. I stayed here for about four days in May.

The only thing was that there were many mosquitoes (it may have been the time of year). Bill helpfully included a bunch of mosquito repellent and an electric mosquito killer thing, as well as a mosquito net for sleeping. ', "73257264;2016年5月;You'd be mad to miss Bill and his apartment!

Location:
Looking at the map, you would be forgiven for assuming that the location is far away from everything and awkward to travel from and to. The opposite is true. Bill sent us a comprehensive information pack that even included photos of bus stops prior to our arrival. There is a direct bus to the locality from the airport. You can hop on a bus from the end of the street to take you directly to the MTR stations, the main shopping areas or the Star Ferry. Buses are incredibly simple and cheap to use and you will never have to wait for more than a couple of minutes. Buy an Octopus card in the airport arrivals hall. All public transport accepts the Octopus card (and a lot of convenience stores as well). On buses, you just tap your card on a reader at the start of a journey. The price is dependent on the distance to the final stop.

Locality:
Kowloon City is a non-touristy, safe, friendly and vibrant part of Hong Kong. It is full of local shops at 'local' prices but also has its share of more upmarket outlets. The choice of restaurants is witout equal. The quality, variety and affordability makes spending time in this area suitable for all budgets. Do not be concerned about not being able to read or speak Cantonese. You will get by and your host will also be a big help. More on that later. Local musts include the Kowloon Walled City Park (5 minutes walk), buying egg tarts from the Hoover Bakery, eating the fresh tofu puddings which have no equivalent and of course Dim Sum – and all on the same street as the apartment!

The Apartment:
It is exactly as described in the listing. It is compact but well equiped, comfortable sofa bed, quiet and efficient AirCon, Spotlessly clean and a place for everything. It comes with a supply of snacks and drinks and has fast and reliable WiFi.  The balcony is a bonus. It looks out on the rear, but is very private. The apartment comes will a free SmartPhone which is useful in so many ways. We used it for navigation, communication with our host and to access the internet whilst out and about. 4G in Hong Kong is everywhere!

The Host:
Bill is a legend. He is kind and considerate. He took time out of his weekend to meet us when we arrived and took us on a tour of local restaurants to help orientate us and introduce us to the local cuisine and the restaurants that people are trying to keep secret from TripAdvisor. When we were leaving, he took us out again! He is interesting very approachable and a fabulous communicator. We were assured that we could countact him at any time, although we did not need this. He was unobtrusive but always available. The perfect host.  Thankyou Bill, you made our holiday :-)", "70544452;2016年4月;There's a reason Bill has so many great reviews - our time at his studio was amazing! The studio looked just like the photos, and getting there from the airport using his instructions was very simple. Bill sent us a DropBox link with lots of PDFs on things to do and how to get around, which was great for helping us plan our days. There were also paper copies in a handy folder in the apartment. The studio was stocked with everything we needed, and there were even snacks and drinks provided when we got in! 
Two small words of warning:
- The bed in the apartment is a foldable futon from Ikea. We were able to sleep well for the most part, but if you have any back issues this could be a problem.
- Sometimes the wifi was a little bit shaky inside the apartment, but when we turned on the hotspot for the cell phone provided there were no problems at all. 
Speaking of the phone, that was so helpful when you're out exploring Hong Kong! Bill was also an incredibly friendly guy, we went out for food with him a couple of times and had a blast.
There's no question: if you're visiting Hong Kong, book Bill's apartment! You'll have a great time!", '69619560;2016年4月;Bill was helpful and kind. He answered our questions and solved our problems promptly. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed and was close to everything. We bought groceries nearby to cook our own meals at the apartment. We will return when we visit Hong Kong again. Many thanks, Bill!', "66353185;2016年3月;Bill's place was for Hongkong standards the best olace to be. The area  is full of restaurants,parks and shops.
Public transport was easy to manage.
As this was my 6th or 8th visit to Hongkong, so l can 
compare it with all the other places l was in.
I hope to come back in the future.
Thank you Bill for hosting us.", "64500051;2016年3月;We rearranged our trip dates just so we could stay at Bill's place, and we weren't disappointed. It is every bit as nice as it looks in the listing - the apartment makes great use of space, is nicely decorated and was  even more private and quieter than we expected for a big city like Hong Kong. The deck is enormous as well, though we didn't really go out there much as we were too busy out exploring the city every day.
There are many local buses nearby but I get carsick easily on buses so we chose to use the subway most of the time. It's a bit of a walk - about 20min to Lok Fu station - but it's an easy walk and also felt totally safe walking back at night as well. Plus you can stop at the Hoover bakery to get delicious egg tarts to eat on the way. 
Kowloon City is a cool 'local feeling' location with lots of food/drink options around - there's a fancy-pants cafe right near the apartment for coffees/westernish food if you're that way inclined, dim sum places, a great homemade tofu place up the road, and also a great Korean fried chicken place a few doors down, as well as the aforementioned Hoover bakery for the best egg tarts. The Kowloon Walled City park is just a few minutes' walk and is a lovely spot for wandering around or just 'sitting out' with the locals.
As a host Bill really goes above and beyond - the kitchen was stocked with drinks and snacks for us, and the apartment not only comes with free wifi (which worked perfectly) BUT ALSO A FREE LOCAL SMARTPHONE to use while you're out exploring. This was so awesome and made life so much easier - you can hotspot the local phone and then use your own smartphone if you want to post photos online, update (Hidden by Airbnb) etc.  Bill is so welcoming and ensures you have what you need, know how to get around etc. He was in town during our stay and took us out for local Dim Sum and then to a great local (no english spoken) tea shop where he facilitated us buying some traditional Pu-erth tea!
Overall I'd rate this a 5/5 for the apartment itself (so cute and nicely set up) plus the great extras like the smartphone, extra coin jar for bus fare, HK tourist guides in the apt and Bill's incredible hospitality. ", '63772074;2016年2月;Bill gave us the best opportunity to explore Hong Kong. He was the perfect host, nice and caring. The apartment was great and felt bigger than in the pictures.
The best thing was the cellphone provided. We never got lost since we could use the internet and GPS on the phone.
Kowloon city is a very cozy part of Hong Kong with lots of cheap restaurants.', "63323267;2016年2月;There really are no words to describe Bill's hospitality. The apartment was very cozy and clean and there were so many snacks, coffee and tea provided. Bill had printed out so many helpful information in various sights and good restaurants. There were coins in case one needed  small change and even an Octupus card in case a guest would need one. The apartment is in a very safe neighborhood of Kowloon City and there are many good opportunities next door if you want to want to eat out or supermarkets nearby in case you want to cook yourself (kitchen is fully equipped).
Bill himself is such a lovely person. We met him twice and had such a great time. It felt like meeting an old friend and we felt so comfortable with him. He invited us to eat out together, gave us small gifts for the Chinese new year and accompanied us to the bus towards the airport on our last day with his lovely niece.
We will definitely be back to Hong Kong in the future and stay at his place again. He made our stay as pleasant as can be! Miss him already :) So, when in Hong Kong, Bill's place is definitely the best! No one will offer you this kind of hospitality!", '61876607;2016年2月;Our first airbnb experience. What a launch!Bill is a very genuine, helpful and hospitable host. Apartment very clean and all the comforts necessary. Kowloon City is as convenient as anywhere else in HK, with the added benefit of being away from the tourist traps, a real experience of living locally. Plenty of cheap gourmet eating experiences only paces away. Thanks Bill. Love to do it again. Jan & Ryan.', "61286291;2016年2月;Bill dots all the 'I's and crosses all the 'T's to ensure you have a trouble-free time at his apartment in Kowloon. It's an easy ride from there into the centre and all your essentials are available and work perfectly. There are also excellent local choices of restaurants etc where you can get a more real experience of Hong Kong. Also the best shower I've ever had in an Airbnb apartment!", "60572685;2016年1月;Thoroughly enjoyed our 3-night stay at Bill's comfy and newly renovated flat. Bill welcomed us upon arrival showing us around and offering any assistance we might have needed. He was very responsive and even brought over an extra space heater as Hong Kong was experiencing record low temperatures during our stay. He definitely made us comfortable. I should mention that the apartment is one flight up with no lift, so dragging up big luggage was a pain but fortunately it was only one flight. Will certainly try to stay here again on our next visit. Thank you Bill.", "59202204;2016年1月;Bill and her sister are friendly and exceptionally welcoming. They are the best hosts I have ever had. 
Their flat is clean, cosy and comfortable. The location is convenient.
Can't be better. 
I highly recommend this host!", "58488780;2016年1月;Bill's small yet cozy apartment is the best choice for people that would like an experience of a local lifestyle. Bill's apartment are also well equipped with necessities. From shampoo, snacks, wifi etc.... you name it he have it!! Bill's place is also easily accessible, instructions given by him was very clear. With the amount of eateries and convenient stores around the corner, you will never be deprive of good local delights!!

Bus stop are just a few minutes walk away and they do have different buses that enable us to get to almost anywhere in hongkong. With phone that he provide us, we are never worried about getting lost in this colourful city. Whenever ideas are ran out, never hesitate to ask bill for any ideas. He reply to messages promptly and will definitely recommend places that satisfy your craving.

This is our first airbnb experience and it was a excellent one. Especially when you have a very thoughtful and welcoming host. Bill also make an effort to meet us, giving us some insight of where to go before we start our little adventure in the city. Lastly, we really enjoyed the stay in Bill's apartment. We won't hesitate to recommend it to anybody, provided if his apartment is available for booking. Thanks bill for the wonderful stay!!", "57237696;2015年12月;Bill's bijou apartment was ideal for a few days' stay in Kowloon. It's comfortable and well stocked with essentials, and having a local mobile phone provided with data made exploring HK much easier. There's a great dim sum place across the street and you're well connected to Central and the airport by buses.

Bill went above and beyond as a host, taking me out for breakfast, offering advice on my outdoor activities and helping me with my bags to the airport bus :) I can't recommend him enough.", "56370315;2015年12月;The experience with Bill has been second to none. In fact, I believe it'll be one of the best I'll ever have. 
Prior to booking, Bill's response rate is extremely high and he addressed all the questions I had regarding the apartment. 
Upon confirmation of booking, Bill even has a dropbox full of itineraries for you to consider (most of them come with pictures of roads and places you should travel along/visit). Now, how thoughtful is that! 
I reached Hong Kong in early morning and Bill managed to arrange for me to check in earlier. He bought us breakfast and took time to have a lovely conversation with us about Hong Kong. Upon hearing that we were interested in baking supplies, he shared his membership card for a particular baking shop without hesitation! 
The apartment is extremely cosy and Bill's sister, Daisy, tidied up the place in a quick and efficient fashion. Even though we checked in early, the place was impeccable. Also, the place is really easy to access and a direct bus ride from the airport will see you to the apartment in less than 45min. The neighbourhood of the apartment is not something to worry about. We felt safe all the time and the only issue was the huge number of food stores around! You can find all sorts of food ranging from desserts to mains to convenience stores minutes away by foot!
MTR card, coin change, cable TV, hot water jet, sachets of 3-in-1s, packet drinks, you name it and Bill has it. The best feature of all was the mobile phone Bill provided which can act as a hotspot for your own devices. We loved the fact that regardless of where we were, we had access to the internet (and therefore the much needed Maps). 
We loved the dinner Bill bought us on one of the nights. It was a very local steamboat dinner that many tourists would have missed! 
Overall, the stay with Bill had been really enjoyable and because of his advice, we had a trip that shared locals' experiences way more than a normal trip! 
Absolutely thankful for all the help and talks with Bill! Thank you Daisy for your help in tidying the place and taking the effort to explain to us where the items were placed in the apartment despite our limited Cantonese vocab. 
Bill is a highly recommended host and his apartment is no different!", "55776675;2015年12月;We had a fantastic stay at Bill's place in Kowloon City, it was a real home from home. We were welcomed by Bill's sister who was cleaning the place when we arrived and it was absolutely spotless. Bill then came along to introduce himself and is such a professional and approachable guy but with a great sense of humour and witty as well! This is a very well equipped, modern, clean place to stay in a really nice neighbourhood which is not full of tourists. With very quick and easy access to the waterfront from where you can jump on the Star Ferry to Central and explore Hong Kong Island and the outlying islands to your hearts content. Arrival is very easy and straightforward and Bill is on hand as little or as much as you like - perfect place, even more perfect host. We highly recommend this place as a perfect base in Hong Kong for a couple.
", "55558775;2015年12月;Bill's place was perfect for our 2 week stay. The apartment and the surroundings had everything that we needed and more. And Bill is fantastic, we had such a great time with him.

The apartment makes extremely good use of its space, and it is very comfortable to stay in. We found everything we need. The phone was quite useful to us and the internet is high speed. Lots of amenities for those travelling.

The apartment is conveniently located and reachable by many, many buses and a Metro station is easily reachable. There are loads of yummy restaurants, try the food court closeby, the dessert place down the street, etc etc. 

Bill met us on several occasions to have lunch and dinner also with his family, and introduced us to local life. It was such a pleasure walking with him through the streets of Kowloon City.

The cherry on top was our guest appearance in one of Bill's TV productions - we are now Hong Kong movie stars!!! Thank you, Bill.

Come to Kowloon City now, before the other tourists discover it!

M goi to Bill and to Daisy!
", "52955124;2015年11月;There isn't a great deal more I can say about Bill's place that hasn't been covered by the others. I may just highlight some key points here: a) I and my husband stayed a total of two weeks at the unit and it offered super value b) though limited in space, the unit was cosy and offered much more than a hotel room - it's clean, the sofa bed was comfortable (both of us are quite big and my husband is over 185cm), it comes with all the extras (mobile phone, wifi at the unit, snacks and even toothpaste for sensitive teeth!) c) there are so many eateries downstairs and within 5-10 mins walk from the unit that we ran out of time in trying them all d) I was worried about transpotation and my biggest concern was that the unit isn't close to an MRT station. The nearest station - Lok Fu is only about 15 mins walk (a bit of an uphill to walk there but it takes less time walking downhill back to the unit and btw there is a plaza with quite a number of shops at Lok Fu Station). There are many buses (we used 1A bus quite a few times which is just 5 mins walk from the unit. If you use 1A to come back, you can get off one stop earlier than the Regal Oriental Hotel stop) and mini buses that you can use instead. The key is to do your homework in advance. (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps come in really handy in searching for public transport and other locational info. We had a day trip to China-Shenzhen via the railway/ subway and getting there from the unit was pretty straight forward. 
In brief we were very pleased with our stay at the unit. Bill and his sister put a lot of effort in making sure their guests will have an enjoyable time. We also stayed at another Airbnb place in Taipei during this holiday and the experience was nothing compared to Bill's place.
Thanks heaps Bill and Daisy. The extra things you have done for your guests have made our stay so much more pleasant! ", "52229706;2015年10月;You can find everything you need in Bill's flat and it makes you feel like home. The neighbourhood area is full of nice restaurants and shops. ", "51700982;2015年10月;You know when you're reading something and it seems way too good to be true? This is not one of those times, book this place immediately! Bill's studio is really that great! THANK YOU!!!!!!", '50854826;2015年10月;This is my second time staying in the apartment and as was my previous experience, Bill was extremely accomodating, responsive, and took pains to make sure I was settled in. Although not right at the doorstep of an MTR station, there are buses that connect you to many parts of town. All in all a comfortable place to stay surrounded with a neighbourhood with local character.', '50614950;2015年10月;Bill definitely lived up to his defending title of "Super Host"! After reading all the reviews about how great Bill's place was, I thought, why not? Definitely cheaper than a decent hotel there. Firstly, Bill made sure I had enough of info to get easily to his place by A22 bus! (Take the bus to see the beautiful Tsing-Ma bridge). 

Gotta love living in Kowloon city. The area has everything a traveller need. 7/11 down the corner with minimarts within 3 mins walk. We personally loved the dim sum restaurant across the street (to the left) and the cafe char chan teng across the street (to the right) that sells wonderful porridge and fried fritters (open till quite late at night). 

The studio-flat had more than what any hotel would provide (ample plugs, hair dryer, cooking utensils, household emergency items etc). Daisy, Bill's sister so detailed in preparing everything, especially all kind of snacks and drinks. Cant get hungry in this flat! Everything was clean, sofa bed comfortable and easy to use. Water pressure great and clean toilet (BONUS POINT!) We also loved the spacious balcony where we sat outside for breakfast and also to chill at night! 

Getting to the city is so easy by taking the 1A bus. (Our favourite bus!) The best part of all, is that Bill provided us with a cell phone with local no that had data enabling us to travel easy with internet! 

Thanks Bill, Daisy and family for everything you done for us. Writing this review is a MUST because we hope others would enjoy the stay at Bill's as much as we did. ', "49987207;2015年10月;Bill was an exceptional AirBnB host. He was flexible and accommodating from the very beginning and was especially welcoming when I arrived at his place.

I do not anticipate having a better AirBnB host in the future.

As for the place, it's great! Incredibly clean, comfortable with a lovely balcony. A great location in Kowloon. A little removed from the action but HK has great transit options and the authentic experience available away from some of the tourist hot spots was incredibly refreshing.

Hats off to Bill and Daisy!", "49758503;2015年10月;AWESOME! this cosy apartment is a gem. Furnished, every detail and fixture is catered to a traveller's need. Affable host Bill Yip really take care of his guest well and give insider's tip to best kept secret and advise on sightseeing. We had a happy, memorable one week stay. ", '48894200;2015年9月;BOOK BILL'S STUDIO NOW OR REGRET MISSING OUT ON A GREAT EXPERIENCE!!! 

I wish there was a 10+++ Star rating for hosts on Airbnb, because it will still NOT be enough to describe how great of a person Bill is. Thank you Bill, and we will see you again! ', "47028032;2015年9月;This was our first Airbnb experience and it couldn't have been a better one. Notre séjour à Hong-Kong chez Bill a été remarquable.  Son appartement est suffisant pour deux personnes. Nous y avons séjourné quinze jours. ", "42866115;2015年8月;Bill's apartment was fantastic. The pictures represent exactly how the place looks and feels, and the man himself is even more friendly and welcoming than I expected. When I arrived, the air conditioning was on and there were cold drinks in the fridge.

I was worried about the location being inconvenient because there isn't a subway stop immediately nearby, but the buses and mini buses were just a minute outside from the apartment.

As for Bill: What an incredible host! He genuinely wants his guests to enjoy their stay in HK and his apartment. If your schedules work out, definitely ask him to take you to the dimsum place across the street. I grew up on dimsum in the San Francisco area, but that little, nondescript restaurant offered the best I've had in years. Bill also offers an insiders view of HK and HK society; I felt like Anthony Bourdain talking to one of the local experts on his TV show.

If you're interested in local history and culture: read up on the Kowloon Walled City. There's a good interactive article on WSJ and tons of photos online. There are even docs on Youtube. Then go check out the park that sits in that space now.

Thanks for everything, Bill!", "42248864;2015年8月;It was my first time with Airbnb, and I am totally glad that I have choose Bill's apartment as a start for my very first venture through this service.

', '30569445;2015年4月;Perfect stay!

"Superhost for superguests" - Bill said me once and this is absolutely right!
Best place ever! ', '30097750;2015年4月;Perfect stay!
We stayed 3 nights in Bill apartment and REALLY enjoyed it. Bill and his sister welcomed us in a very friendly way: we talked candidly about HK, China, the world... Thank you very much for all Bill, you own your "Superhost" title: you sincerely worth it :) ', "29542421;2015年4月;I had a great experience at Bill's place! ', '25537019;2015年1月;Bill has been a really great host! His apartment is clean and has everything you need. I love the balcony as it is a nice place to sit down and chill at night with your friends. I would definitely stay in his apartment again if i were to visit hong kong. ', "25403419;2015年1月;Staying at Bill's was a great experience and Bill is a wonderful host! The apartment was spotless, comfortable, and well-serviced. It's perfect for two people. The location couldn't be better for our needs with incredible dining options within a couple of blocks. We had some of the best roast goose just downstairs, extra tasty hot pots a couple of blocks away and the best egg tarts just around the corner. And most importantly, great dim sum a few shops down the street. In our opinion, this was the best neighbourhood in Hong Kong when it came to food and people. Kowloon City has remained quite low-key and tourist-free compared to other areas and that is a plus for us. Another plus, one can actually have uninterrupted sleep staying here. Neighbours and shopkeepers were really friendly and welcoming. We stayed for 2 weeks but we should have stayed longer. When planning the trip we had lofty aspirations of exploring every part of Hong Kong. Once there, though, we decided that Kowloon City and its vicinities were worth exploring as much as the better-know areas. Again, Bill was great and went to great lengths to ensure we had a trouble-free and fun holiday. We weren't expecting him to look after us the way he did. Bill also took us dining in places that would have been difficult to discover on our own (with our rusty Cantonese). ', "24322345;2014年12月;Apparently, Bill is one of the top-rated airbnb hosts in the world. This claim is not unfounded: here I am adding another 5-star review to his mile-long list of 4 & 5-star reviews. His flat is lovely and has everything two people could ever need to live there for a while; it is in the best possible place for someone like myself - Kowloon City, and that area in particular, has a stunning array of cheap and delicious food. My friend and I were hit by midnight cravings several times over the course of 10 days, and there is no better cure for that than congee at the restaurant downstairs and to the left. The streets around the area are perfect for wandering around at all times of the day - there's always something of local Hong Kong life to see, whether it's the market, vegetable shops or pickle-tasting at the more traditional provision shops. While I never ended up using the itineraries he prepared, they have no doubt been useful for every other guest. 

I was lucky enough to have met Bill twice: once for dinner with him and his friend, and the second time for lunch with him and Franco (the other airbnb host in the area). Bill is lovely and friendly and incredibly hospitable, and also bakes delicious raisin cookies. One day I'll be back in Hong Kong and would definitely meet up with him again if possible. 

If you are like me and enjoy sleeping on the floor, you may find yourself waking up with a lower backache and stiff shoulders most days from the sofa bed, but these are just some of the things you live with when you travel. Don't let that stop you from staying here. ", '24019155;2014年12月;(Website hidden by Airbnb) completely join the previous responses. If you want to feel at home on a trip, you here. Room is not tiny, quite comfortably. Everything is very clear. All details are thought over. To us it was very comfortable, thanks a lot to the owner.
        Мы жили семьей (я, муж и 7-летняя дочка) около 11-ти дней. Студия вполне нормальных размеров. Диван-кровать большая, поместились все. В квартире все продумано до мелочей (приготовлены даже свечи на балконе, батарейки и иголка с ниткой). Называется - все для вас и даже больше. Если вы не поклонник шума и суеты - вам сюда. Проблем с поиском квартиры не будет - хозяин дает очень четкие инструкции, как найти квартиру (мы добрались в 11 вечера из аэропорта без проблем). До метро минут 10, автобусные остановки - 4-8 минут (разные). Рядом куча магазинов, кафе. Мы ходили в park-n-shop рядом с Lok Plaza (около метро), брали продукты и иногда готовили сами. В квартире есть холодильник (в описании это не указано). Также понравилось исламское кафе рядом, кафе Cerera (есть в описании у Билла).  Хозяин очень внимательный и деликатный. Относится к вам как к  дорогому гостю. Очень признательны ему за это. Если будем еще когда-нибудь в Гонконге, то обязательно постараемся попасть сюда снова.
', "23621831;2014年12月;Bill is an incredibly friendly and helpful host with an apartment located in a very convenient place close to transit, good food and in a real community. ", '21574873;2014年10月;Highly recommended host.  Bill is accommodating, attentive and extremely friendly.  The apartment is beautifully furnished, cosy and exceptionally clean. ', '20812899;2014年10月;Bill, thank you so much for this perfect stay in Hongkong. It is in an older building, but the apartment is very clean.  Even though the bed is a pull out bed, it was so comfortable.  Awesome stay!", "17041720;2014年8月;This was my first experience with Airbnb and I am pretty sure I hit the jackpot on my first attempt. Also, I am a bit of an amateur writer, so this may be a little long. Allow me to summarize - I am ready to put my money on the fact that Bill's apartment is one of the best you will find on this website and you should book it without further thought. If the word of a fellow traveler is not enough to convince you, allow me to elaborate. The apartment was everything I had hoped for and more. It was extremely easy to get to the place from the airport if one followed Bill's directions. Departmental stores, a laundry, medical stores, a bakery, a McDonald's - basically anything you might need is nearby. Once inside the apartment, the thing that first struck me was how the place was exactly as it is in the pictures here. The amenities in the house were also present as described. Expect to find a lot of snacks, biscuits, soft drinks, coffee powder, tea bags and all the essential cooking ingredients etc in the cabinets in the kitchen. The washroom had all the toiletries etc present in abundant supply and there were probably two dozen towels in the cupboard. It would not be an overstatement to say, that the house had everything that we needed during our two week stay. A steam iron with an ironing board, a pair of umbrellas, hair dryer, kitchen utensils, wine opener, universal plug points(one of which I unwittingly managed to carry back with myself),mobile phone(with free incoming calls from anywhere and unlimited local calls), pocket wifi device etc. I could probably have taken my flight from India with only my passport and my set of clothes and yet have not needed to buy a single thing in HK. The sofa cum bed was extremely comfortable and easily large enough for two. The balcony was perfect for a smoke. The room was quiet throughout the day and a good night's sleep was never a problem. Another thing that I must mention is the folder that Bill leaves for all his guests. It has itineraries and directions for almost all the places to be seen in HK as well as recommendations regarding the restaurants near the apartment. The folder was extremely helpful to us during our stay. Lastly, about the man himself. Bill was just the perfect host. All our queries prior to and during the trip were replied to quickly and he was always there whenever we needed any sort of help during our time in Hong Kong. We had the pleasure of having dinner with him and were absolutely amazed by his knowledge of Indian cinema. To you Bill, it may be a long way out in the future, but I do hope to return to the apartment someday. Thank you for the hospitality. I cannot think of a single thing that you should change in the...", "15722986;2014年7月;Bill is great, the place is great, Kowloon City is great. Yes, the place is small. But it's expected in HK. ', "9191947;2013年12月;Another very enjoyable stay at Bill's apt. This was my 2nd time there. He was even more generous and friendly than the last time and that was pretty hard to beat already. Thanks a lot Bill!", "9111966;2013年12月;In short: we loved it. 

We spent over a week at Bill's place and it was perfect for us. Although Kowloon City might not be the most obvious destination for travellers it is ideal for people who want to get off the tourist trail and away from the usual traps. As Bill describes, the neighbourhood is full of fantastic restaurants and has great shops, parks and a thriving market. There was great coffee just downstairs and some of the best food we ate in Hong Kong we found in the neighbouring streets (the mutton curry at Islam Food is a must!). While the neighbourhood has a great buzz it is also a welcome relief to come home to somewhere a little more sedate than downtown Kowloon or Central. Transport was easy and efficient. 

The apartment itself is stylishly designed to maximise space, the bed is comfortable and a good size and the shower is great. The small size of the apartment wasn't an issue at all for two people. The kitchen was generously stocked with snacks and drinks. And the TV and DVD player are great for catching up on your favourite Hong Kong movies after a big day of sight seeing! 

As the other reviews attest, Bill is an exceptional host and could not have made us feel more welcome. He was always helpful and full of suggestions but never intrusive. He had a real talent for understanding what we wanted to get out of our time in Hong Kong - almost before we did! Our time there would not have been the same without his hospitality.   

Thoroughly recommended. 
", '8965966;2013年11月;As the moment we walk into Bill’s apartment; it gave us the “home feeling” already. Bill & his sister, Daisy, had been very helpful and provided more than what we need and expected. Bill is a very responsive & great host. He sent us the surrounding area information in advance and touch based with us day before we arrived. During our staying, Daisy came to clean up the place for us and even made a special trip to bring us extra blanket as the weather got cold. We were so surprised for the services Bill & Daisy provided. It is so much better than the 4/5 stars hotel that we stayed at before.
Chatting with Bill as fun and comforting. We felt like we had known him for sometime already even though this is the first time we met. We really appreciated everything Bill did for us. Not just for the dinner that Bill treated us, but also he gave up his rest time to keep us company. We had a good time during our stay & were very happy to also became friends with Bill. 
We would highly recommend Bill & his place to anyone that I know who is planning to visit Hong Kong soon & in the future.
', '8701282;2013年11月;Bill is truly an ideal host. He gave us incredibly detailed and useful instructions that catered to our needs. For our 24hr stay, we followed his guidance and had a great time. Notably, whenever we had a question, he always replied in a kind and timely manner. Truly a gentleman. The bed is bigger and longer than it appears. Most importantly, the mobile modem is so useful for foreign travellers. Thanks again Bill!', '8652301;2013年11月;If you can get by without having the MTR at your doorstep (I could - buses are available and cabs are cheap), this appartment is really excellent. The place is cosy, clean, well maintained, and as it appears in the photos. Bill and Daisy were excellent in making sure that all needs were met, and were able to be in ready communication when help was required. Bill also sent a list of recommended places to eat at, as well as places of note in the neighbourhood before I arrived so it made staying in Kowloon City a lot more interesting.', "8624128;2013年11月;Bill is the man. He was very helpful, even in the weeks leading up to our arrival in HK. When I told him that my friend and I preferred not to share a (sofa) bed, he went and purchased an air mattress for me. He also left us his phone, which proved to be extremely helpful as a mobile hotspot as we moved around the city. Bill is a great host.
The place itself was small, but it had everything we needed. It took a little while to situate ourselves and our big suitcases, but once we were settled, space wasn't an issue and we were very comfortable. 
I would recommend this place to anyone; the apartment is straightforward and simple, Bill is generous, kind, and a great host. ", "8586814;2013年11月;We had a wonderful stay at Bill's place. He was waiting for us as our arrival to HK was delayed. He happily showed us around his cozy place, fully stocked up with necessities and also food! It immediately made us felt like home. He also took some time off to even bring us around the block to guide us through on the surrounding area, and also how to commute from where we were to the main attraction places. His place is super convenient, and a wide variety of food are available with just a short walk away. 
Bill is a very friendly and helpful host, and his place is highly recommended for all! We would definitely be back for more!", "8458232;2013年11月;Bill offered more than just a place to stay while I was in Hong Kong, he offered interesting views of the local culture, current events and suggestions for attractions that might not be listed on the regular tourism leaflet. 

The place itself is very well kept and cozy. There's even a portable wifi available for travelers going around the city. The location is very convenient for traveling all parts of the Hong Kong (including MTR, KCR).  

Bill himself is a very well spoken and friendly person.  I was very glad that I got to stay at this unit!!", "7963608;2013年10月;Bill has to be the most attentive host I've met on airbnb so far. He went out of his way to help and give information about everything from check-in, getting around and places to visit. He even gave me a personal tour of the neighborhood on the first evening. Thanks again for the delicious thai dinner! The apartment is as described, clean, convenient and fully equipped. The portable Wifi was very handy to access e.g. (Hidden by Airbnb) maps which provided accurate information for bus connections to easily get around, as the apartment is a bit away from the subway in a lively, more local neighborhood. Highly recommended!", "7674529;2013年9月;Bill's apartment feels bigger than what appears on the photos. We could see from the many details that Bill is not just renting out his apt., he is also trying to ensure his guests are having an enjoyable experience - sparkling cleanliness, tasteful deco, quality amenities, comfy bed, generous drinks, prompt correspondents ... etc. For the location, Kowloon City is undergoing an early stage of re-development, so there are still some authentic and soulful cafes, diners and ethnic spice stores available, especially if you're into Thai or Chaozhou cuisines. My wife and I love our stay there. Thanks a lot Bill.", "7522759;2013年9月;Bill's apartment was an absolute delight! I can walk down to get food anytime and it was convenient to get around despite not being near a MTR. The apartment size was ideal for 2 people easily. He has also furnished it nicely. He even provided toothbrushes and toothpaste! A lot of consideration must have been put into it. 

Despite not having met Bill, I did meet his sister Daisy who helped me settle in nicely. Bill also texted me from time to time to check that I am well and that my needs are met. 

Thanks very much for having me!", '7385909;2013年9月;Bill is a fantastic host and his place is in a very cool neighborhood in Kowloon. I couldn't have asked for a better experience. If you get the chance to meet Bill and maybe have a meal in "Little Bangkok" jump at it! Thanks so much Bill - hopefully see you again in Hong Kong or Chicago!', "7306146;2013年9月;Bill's place is excellent only beaten by the host himself.  Booked the place for my family to stay (as we live in a small place locally) and got rave reviews back every day... especially regarding the terrace, which proved to be a great location to muse on the day's activity plans. 
The place is well kept, clean and stocked with a bit more than just the essentials. 
This was our first Airbnb experience and found Bill to be really flexible and informative - a top bloke. ", "7101075;2013年9月;Bill is a perfect host and so is his apartment a perfect place to stay in Hong Kong. As all the apartments in Hong Kong are quiet small this one is really good organized and you have more space as it looks like in the pictures. There is everything you need to feel really at home. And the balcony is amazing! Although there is no big view it was fantastic to sit outside and relax with a morning coffee away from the street hustle. We also enjoyed the neighborhood very much as there are plenty of restaurants and shops. From this part of Hong Kong it is very easy to go to all the others places you might want to see because the bus stops are quiet near. Taking a bus is really easy, especially when you have the Octopus card which you can buy e.g. at the airport. Bill is an amazing host and if you have the chance to spend time with him you won't regret it. He is very well organized and there will be every information you need to stay in his apartment and in Hong Kong as well just when you arrive. He also offered us a pocket wifi to use during our stay. So, if you are looking for the perfect place to stay in Hong Kong, you have found it when you read this. Enjoy!", "6902327;2013年8月;Bill's flat is cool and very clean. The air con is a blessing in Hong Kong's very hot summer; the sofa bed is comfy, the shower hot and the kitchen has all you'll need.

The area of Hong Kong that the flat is in is surrounded by restaurants and eateries - great Thai, Malaysian, Chinese and other Asian foods can be found here, and cheaply. The intriguing Kowloon park is very near and you can get to the flat easily from the airport.

Lastly, Bill is a wonderful host - kind, courteous and more than happy to give you hints, tips and ideas for your time in Hong Kong. We wish we could have stayed longer and would recommend Bill's flat to any couple or lone traveller visiting Hong Kong.", "6782198;2013年8月;Bill's apartment was wonderful! Tastefully decorated, and well-stocked with everything we needed. Having a clean (and pretty!) shower after traveling for so long was a treat. The terrace area was wonderful and made the apartment feel twice as big, and more secluded from the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong. We used the apartment as a place to unwind and relax after a long time traveling, and it was perfect for just that. It would also be ideal for an individual or couple who are out traveling or working during the day.

Bill was extremely helpful, showing us around the neighborhood, helping us find and then order at a vegetarian restaurant, and placing us on a minibus to go shopping--something we would not have been able to figure out on our own! He even ordered us a taxi for when we left to the airport. Aside from all that, he is really interesting, and clearly passionate and knowledgeable about Hong Kong.

We need to invent a reason to return to Hong Kong, so we can stay at Bill's apartment! ---Sarah & Ariel", '6657873;2013年8月;All in all first rate host and apartment!

Bill’s attention to fine detail and genuine hospitality was very evident from pre-trip instructions, actual accommodation environment, and communications throughout. He was especially accommodating when it comes to altered arrangement and length of stay.

It would be a pleasure to stay at Bill’s again, or perhaps have a coffee or two with him in the future!
', "6321306;2013年8月;Excellent location and great place! The location is convenient as you can take all kinds of buses and trains to everywhere in the city. There are also a lot of supermarkets, restaurants, and even a laundry store nearby. Bill is very kind and helpful and can accommodate all kinds of needs. Also, while most places in the city are cramped and uncomfortable, this place is reasonably big and comfortable for a traveler who needs good rest every night. I really can't say anything bad about this place because I really had a pleasant time in Hong Kong. I would love to stay here again if I ever travel to Hong Kong in the future.", '5896069;2013年7月;Same as last time, it is a very pleasant stay. As usual, Bill is there to warmly greet us. There have been some improvements around the small apartment, like additional storage area on the bedside which are so nice. Bill also added some drawers within the closets. The experience is getting better and better!', '5732910;2013年7月;Bill was so kind and took us to have a dinner together.
Very respective and kind guy and we became a good friends with him.

Here in Japanese
Billさんは非常に親切かつﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰな方で大変おすすめの滞在先です!回りには飲食店も多く､観光だけでなく長期滞在にもおすすめできます｡我々の香港生活はここから始まり､大変思いで深い場所です｡', "4847586;2013年5月;The apartment looks exactly like the photos, if not nicer. Even though it is a small apartment, it should fit a couple more than enough. I find the bathroom very comfortable and spacious, especially considering the size of the flat. It has a very large balcony to hang around, if you don't mind the a little lack of privacy since the neighbors are quite close and can see through.

The apartment is situated at the most convenient part of the area. It is near to everything (e.g. restaurants, supermarkets), except MTR which need to take a minibus transfer nearby.

The host, Bill, is very helpful in all aspect. He is reliable, very friendly and flexible. He responded to my messages promptly. His attention to details to accommodate the guests is exceptional (e.g. toiletries, blankets, slippers) . My wife and I have a very pleasant stay, and would definitely be back to this nice apartment!", "4384582;2013年5月;We stayed at Bill's flat in April 2013. We found it to be bright, clean, well-equipped and comfortable. The flat is located in an interesting neighbourhood with easy bus access to the MTR and destinations throughout Kowloon. A great-value in Hong Kong!"]
column18: 厨房、无线网络、有线电视、暖气、书桌/工作区域、除此之外还有12个便利设施

column17:
['426437906;2019年3月;房子很有设计感,床边的墙上一排时尚和美学的书籍,选的都是非常棒的书,房主品味应该很好｡房子大小很合适,里面东西很齐全｡周围吃饭购物都很方便,离地铁站走几步路就到了｡美中不足,电视节目有点少,希望房东改进一下｡', '426122627;2019年3月;位置好,性价比超高', '424639481;2019年3月;很好', '424132946;2019年3月;挺舒服的', '423694719;2019年3月;非常舒服的一间小屋,装修布置都很舒服｡忙了一天可以在里面泡个澡看看书籍全身心的放松,是一个非常棒的去处', '422439517;2019年3月;作为深圳之旅的住处,主要有以下几点印象深刻
#位置不错,如果想游玩龙岗是个非常不错的选择;
#装修有格调,房间虽然实际面积不大,但是性价比高,装修精致;
#房东热情好客,解答周全;
#一应设施齐全,且质量不错(这次的唯一缺点是沐浴露没了,大概还没来得及补);
#房屋比较隔音,窗口不面向街道,夜晚比较安静;
#床头有很多书,选的都很不错,很喜欢,每天晚上都在读,也有被种草｡

主要有以下两点让人稍感不适
#拖鞋很脏,还有淡淡的脚臭味,咳,自己在楼下便利店买了新的;
#浴缸略小,170+的男士使用感欠佳(不过真心是最配卫生间大小的选择了,热水器等设备很全,不执着于泡澡的朋友请忽略这一点,毕竟价格如此低廉)', '418787665;2019年3月;挺棒的房子!布置很好看❤️
地理位置附近有点点老旧,空间比想象小了一点,但利用的特别好｡
希望窗帘可以改进一下~', '417670456;2019年2月;位置很好找,房东也很贴心,房间装饰得非常好看,喜欢浴缸', '417379093;2019年2月;房间超级好看,很舒服', '417085795;2019年2月;性价比很高,房间内东西也非常齐全,很温馨的感觉,推荐', '416748232;2019年2月;无', '415999239;2019年2月;想的很周到 灭蚊器什么的都准备的很齐全 房间特别适合拍照 周边居民环境也好 把东西放在大厅了也完全没关系 第一次来深圳不熟悉还麻烦小姐姐帮忙寄存了东西 人超级热情! 而且房间特别好看  浴缸什么的都超级适合拍照啊  房间价格还实惠~', '414834420;2019年2月;非常好的选择,室内装潢非常有调性,很喜欢,基础设施非常完善,推荐给大家｡', '409178763;2019年2月;整体来说都不错,只是我们选错了住址,来回路程比较远,离景点都比较远｡', '408290867;2019年2月;温馨舒服的装修风格,温暖用心的布置,安宁便利的位置,而且可能是快要过年的缘故,周围非常安静~房东滴回复非常迅速,考虑非常周到~~很不错的居住体验,留下了美好的回忆!!', '407115093;2019年2月;很好的体验', '406808196;2019年1月;超级棒的啊 我是过来拍照的每个地方我都很喜欢', '404428932;2019年1月;很满意的一次居住体验', '403903368;2019年1月;感谢亲爱的溜达姐姐~态度特别可亲,公寓也很漂亮~一切俱全｡灰常推荐大家来入住哦', '402888404;2019年1月;房东小姐姐很棒噢~附近吃喝玩乐也很便利', '369275140;2019年1月;很好的房子   就是隔音不是特别好', '366611562;2019年1月;房东姐姐像个导游一样,各种细心,回应问题非常速度｡奈斯', '361980316;2018年12月;晚上房间效果非常棒', '360261824;2018年12月;还不错', '358297737;2018年12月;房间十分温馨,房东人也超好^ - ^', '356344682;2018年12月;房东姐姐人很好 我因为个人原因一直在询问问题 也都没有不耐烦一一体贴的回复了我 惊喜的是现在这间换成了浴缸 让原本想住浴缸房但却没订到的我超大开心大满足!
周边交通设施也很方便 房间其实Size让人很有安全感!下次来还会住的~', '355407400;2018年12月;适合情侣哦,星星灯很美,挂在枝干上形成了星星的图样,房主真的很细心啦', '354166296;2018年12月;房东真的是超赞 回复消息快 要什么有什么 简直像个机器猫 这是第一次民宿体验 感觉房东人真的很好 房间整体也还不错 我住的这个房间可能要比周边小酒店贵一些  但是还是一次很好的体验', '351486702;2018年11月;第二次住了真的特别好的选择,交通很方便,周围也有商场,吃喝也比较多｡下次来还会选择住在这里｡', '349617287;2018年11月;太棒了 很开心', '346846920;2018年11月;地方还是很好找的｡下了地铁直走,到了第一个红绿灯路口左转,接着直走｡到了第二个路口,右转,走一小段路就可以看见白色柱子,到达｡

第一个路口,左手边拐弯有甜品店,右手有广源肠粉,左转后走大概2.30米,右手边会有一个老上海馄饨｡他家馄饨挺好吃的｡也不会｡分量足｡第二个路口,右手边有一个便利店｡

公寓楼里外不在想象中｡好像6.7楼是个小宾馆｡8楼一出电梯em…我也不知道怎么形容｡因为不太像居住的地方｡更像办公地点｡挺安静的｡因为我是半夜入住的,所以大概到了晚上两三点吧,附近的工地开始施工了｡我能接受｡不会影响我休息｡

有个莲蓬头的问题｡莲蓬头是差不多和马桶高度齐平,洗的时候可能要自己举着吧｡也许是我没找到它有高处可以放的地方｡热水要放很久才会有｡那天我基本没等到放来热水冲了个凉水澡｡女生住的话,要注意一下｡等放到了热水,再脱衣服洗澡,中间也别隔太久,水会凉的,到时候又得重新放｡

总体还是很不错的｡', '346519368;2018年11月;挺好的小姐姐很热情', '346256589;2018年11月;位置好找,便利｡房子虽不大,对于短期逗留也足够了｡沟通非常愉快,指引很贴心,光是这一点就棒棒哒｡有行李保管,可以放心去办事再回来拿行李｡', '341433015;2018年10月;风格很适合拍照啦哈哈哈~床很舒服哦', '338565109;2018年10月;房间的氛围好棒 和预想的差不多 担心很久的蛋糕还好有冰箱  麻雀虽小 五脏俱全 ❤️溜达小姐姐超级nice 我有什么需要的 都会联系阿姨给我送 总是很及时回复 也很耐心贴心 很棒的一次体验✨', '338213080;2018年10月;房间比想象中的小一些,其他都很不错,房东姐姐也很热心,我们耳环掉了,h还帮忙寄回来,真的非常感谢', '333218018;2018年10月;房间的装修风格很棒 蓝牙电视微波炉电冰箱都有  洗漱用品也是挺棒的  只是卫生间很小 用的是帘子与卧室隔开  热水来的稍慢 总体还是很不错的 房主很热情附近超市也很多 交通便利', '330715827;2018年10月;房间特别复古漂亮,舒服干净,设备齐全,房东热情好客,根完美的一次体验｡', '329873908;2018年9月;大床真的很舒服!!出门地铁也很近~很方便｡喜欢蓝牙音响和男朋友单号音乐很有情调!', '325845664;2018年9月;房东小姐姐很热情 房子很温馨哦超级适合拍照 生活物品也很齐全 交通也很方便  有机会会再来哒', '325160848;2018年9月;房间装饰非常美丽', '324847301;2018年9月;房间有格调,舒服!房东很好很热情也很耐心回答我的问题,哈哈哈,感谢!因为台风天气停运了,感谢她的理解让我们及时换了时间!感恩!', '320491352;2018年9月;很棒哦 一开始就知道离我要去的南山区福田区比较远 为了装修而去的 没有让我失望 特别棒 真的什么都有 房东很热情 发的贴士简直像个导游 很棒的体验', '318589512;2018年9月;房东小姐姐,人非常好,家里也很漂亮舒服,体验很好!', '313710215;2018年8月;房子什么挺好的 溜达的回复非常快速 基本上上有什么问题 (Hidden by Airbnb) 上都是秒回 但是位置不太喜欢 离福田罗湖远不过是自己的原因 定之前没看留意', '312619111;2018年8月;房子虽小,五脏俱全,英式风格的装饰特别有情调,房间里的插花用的都是真花,红酒酒杯一应俱全,一个人住也可以很浪漫｡阳台种了很多花,看了让人赏心悦目｡房东特别的热情,回复消息也很及时,纸巾不够用还特意冒着大雨送了过来,还顺便送了圣女果给我吃,很贴心｡', '311285977;2018年8月;一般般啦', '304625776;2018年8月;小房子很好看,装饰很复古｡', '303215419;2018年8月;位置不错
洗澡的地方改进一下就好了', '302707377;2018年8月;房东人很好,有什么需求或是在当地的一些问题都会热心解答｡交通的话旁边就是地铁站,去东部华侨城有直达公交,但是要做好被挤成狗的准备｡去别的景点虽说可以坐地铁但是比较远,而且深圳公交巨贵｡房间还算干净､整洁,但是厕所淋浴设施比较鸡肋(排水口在上坡,需要扫水),每天洗澡洗衣服都是一场恶战｡然后房间其实挺小,但是对于这个价钱来说可以了,总归比宾馆好咯｡', '299889218;2018年8月;玲姐真的巨好,我和我的小伙伴都超爱她和她的民宿,因为来深圳住民宿一眼相中的,没想到是Big surprise,拍了很多好看的照片,下一次来要住法式!玲姐真的像大姐姐一样照顾我们,所以说性价比和招待各方面都没的说,从细节看来也能知道玲姐是一个有涵养和品味的女孩纸❤️感谢!!!', '299438256;2018年7月;房东很贴心,房间性价比挺高的｡', '298086137;2018年7月;很好看的房子,里面的东西也很齐全 能想到的都有啦 卸妆水卸妆棉都有', '296910937;2018年7月;房间很小但是很精致啊,必备的东西都有,很温馨的感觉啊｡溜达姐也很好,有问题就会立马解决,很满意的一次住宿经历｡', '291528794;2018年7月;离地铁站很近,楼下有两根白色大柱子,还挺好找的｡附近吃饭的地方蛮多的,打车什么的也很方便,位置很棒!房间布置很好看!一开门有点惊艳到啦~各种用品一应俱全,牙刷是极细软毛太感动了｡一开始没有拖鞋,说了之后马上送了过来,服务很周到!洗衣机､小冰箱､加湿器､蓝牙音响都有~可以说很舒服了哈哈,美中不足还是洗澡的时候吧,要稍微扫一下水,以及要手持淋浴喷头,其他都很完美啦!', '290731774;2018年7月;麻雀虽小五脏俱全,非常精致的一个小房间,窗帘的遮光有点不够好,其他都不错', '289265188;2018年7月;是一个很好的小姐姐房东,对于需要补充的日用品回复和补充也是非常的快,房间总体来说是合适的,就是卫生间每次洗完澡都需要扫一下,地板积水,虽说还好啦不过还是希望房东小姐姐可以改善一下嗷｡房间风格很喜欢!特别是被子的颜色和墙纸,气氛灯也很okay,nice~走之前拍了照片 哈哈哈可以发朋友圈啦~ 是一个愉快的假期,房间住的很舒服,电梯需要门禁卡扫,很安全｡房间有点小,不过东西很齐全,1米5的双人床,完全合适｡溜啦~ 深圳太热啦,天气太好啦!回成都接受暴雨的洗礼~', '285486736;2018年7月;房间真的超级好看呢!!感觉每一处角落都可以拍超好看的照片｡空间的布置和利用率好高,还有很多好看的书｡小姐姐人超级好呢,虽然这次没有见到,但是小姐姐好细心的发了旅行指南｡以后再来深圳一定还要住小姐姐的房子呢', '277719638;2018年6月;厕所可以在改善一下', '275857606;2018年6月;超级精致的小屋子,一进去都被惊艳到了哦,而且溜达姐超级超级贴心,感动!', '271993777;2018年6月;来旅游的这几天,房间一件比一件好,溜达是我的最后一站,给我一个很完美的结局,房间的布局和风格真的非常nice,大爱!设施完善,就是玩不来那个加湿器,哈哈哈哈哈哈哈,强烈推荐,房东小姐姐很贴心哦!', '271621767;2018年6月;住起来非常舒服  室内环境很好  设备很周全', '265663791;2018年5月;非常棒的入住体验~房间布置很温馨,很干净,溜达姐特别好给了很仔细的使用指导还给了很多周边环境介绍~离地铁站很近大概走五分钟就能到,而且公交站还有直接到机场的大巴｡周围餐厅很多,价格也不贵｡下次来还会住这里~', '263371068;2018年5月;很棒的住宿体验 房东姐姐很细心 有什么问题都会帮忙解决 帮忙推荐了很多东西 周围也是比较方便的 近地铁 住的很舒服 是一次很棒的体验~', '261777167;2018年5月;位置很方便,5分钟到乐购超市,5分钟到3号地铁线!房间细节很好,有很多贴心小物件!房东很热情,给我推荐了游玩攻略,可惜时间太紧没有去成!', '260773176;2018年5月;溜达很热情哦,房间真的好甜好喜欢', '256557035;2018年4月;环境正到晚上也很安静｡
离地铁站公交站不远,附近也有很多吃的', '255953938;2018年4月;房间与图片上一样,特别好看的,东西也很齐全,有洗衣机还有加湿器,连小冰箱都有,房东姐姐特别贴心,还推荐了周围吃喝玩乐的地方｡不过就是厕所容易积水,洗完澡的时候要清扫一下地面,总体上还是很好的~', '253309266;2018年4月;房子地理位置很是方便 房东人也超好', '252511005;2018年4月;房东很好人喔,虽然没有见到,但是很体贴,房间虽然不大,但是挺干净的,装饰也不错,附近也挺多吃的,离地铁也很近,很方便', '250708927;2018年4月;房东人真的超好 可以说是最好的一次住房体验了', '249811697;2018年4月;就在龙城广场地铁站附近,位置很好找~房东超好喔很热情｡整体住得蛮舒服~房间里的装饰很精致,用品齐全｡加湿器还没去开过哈哈哈小遗憾希望有机会再来浴室可以再改善下就更棒咯', '248236202;2018年3月;房东姐姐人非常好非常好客热情 房间很精美 非常适合拍照 位置很好 楼下就是地铁站 房间东西设施非常全', '246191032;2018年3月;布置的很温馨,有家的感觉~~~', '243178002;2018年3月;房东人很好很贴心', '239488242;2018年3月;很好', '238558926;2018年2月;房东非常nice,房间不大,但是挺精致的,挺喜欢的', '237421174;2018年2月;房东姐姐很好,很贴心,给我们说了了周边娱乐设施也很热情,还给我们送了酸奶~', '234248547;2018年2月;房间真的style很棒很适合拍照房间超级干净温馨 房主姐姐非常nice 很热心很体贴 总之非常棒!周边购物商城也很多也靠近地铁站很方便!', '232738128;2018年2月;这样的一个单间能布置得如此低调奢华有内涵不简单,特别细心的准备了很多日用品,可见房主有多贴心细致｡周边交通也很便利,附近商场也很多｡', '232483905;2018年2月;房间不大但是设施一应俱全,而且装饰布置特别好评,房东姐姐特别贴心,有机会还会来的!', '232076825;2018年2月;环境不错,生活设施很齐全｡', '230802076;2018年1月;房东姐姐人完全非常特别好!位置也很好找,房间也超漂亮><', '230317078;2018年1月;房间比想象中的大!干净也好看,东西很齐全嗷!地址也好找房东姐姐也很好安利了很多东西', '229685735;2018年1月;房东人超级好', '229143314;2018年1月;环境很好,地理位置优越 房间非常非常美!!!!!设施完善!', '227762552;2018年1月;凌晨三点到达的深圳,美女房东提前把路线图文并茂详细的发给了我,还一直等我达到,感动满满!进房间发现比图片还温馨!房东还细心的准备了吃的以及各种书籍,一路疲惫也因香香的热水澡荡然无存!看得出每样东西房东都是用心准备的!下次来深圳龙岗还会选择!', '223174487;2018年1月;炒鸡棒的民俗,很有艺术氛围｡阳光明媚~房东也很nice~在大运体育馆参加活动的朋友可以考虑哦!', '222137388;2017年12月;很棒很温馨的地方~ 房东人很nice,给了很多建议,设施一应俱全,周边吃饭出行也都很方便~下回还会考虑住在这里的!', '220828603;2017年12月;房东姐姐非常热情好客!我到达当天是凌晨三点多,姐姐一直在等我,还提前为房间开好了空调和加湿器,并且为我们准备了蛋糕和牛奶,非常贴心了｡还有一个小冰箱,放点吃的完全没有问题｡住起来也很舒服,非常棒的体验｡', '219983481;2017年12月;环境超级棒!非常温馨舒适!屋内配套设施绝对超乎你想象!屋主姐姐超好人,强烈推荐!', '219806516;2017年12月;位置特别好找,就在地铁站旁边｡走路3分钟就到了｡房间跟图片一样漂亮,没想到深圳还有这么漂亮的公寓啊｡整体很舒服也很有格调,特别是深圳这几天冷冷的在房间吹空调好暖好舒服,要不是第二天已经有人订我都想续住啦｡看得出房东很用心的准备了蓝牙音箱,电脑以及很健康的零食和饮料｡总之是非常棒的一次体验,下次还要来住｡谢谢房东溜达姐的用心｡', '219231042;2017年12月;真的很感谢宇玲的热情接待,宇玲大方得体,友善诚恳,对于房客和房子具有相当责任心｡
房子很有格调,从入住和感官上看得出对房客细致入微的考虑,房间大小合适,通风明亮,加上宇玲的影响,感觉在家很温馨｡
楼下就是地铁,到达周边要道枢纽都很方便｡
很开心的一次体验,希望宇玲一切顺心,生活愉快｡祝好｡', '265980844;2018年5月;超级奶思的小姐姐,房子也超级漂亮!!!', '221873462;2017年12月;性价比非常高的住宿单位,房东精心装修,氛围很好｡', '402583223;2019年1月;房子很棒很棒!位置也不錯周圍好多吃的玩的!', '336133158;2018年10月;very great!!', '335740290;2018年10月;good', '273085137;2018年6月;nice', '257356629;2018年4月;', "245148290;2018年3月;it's really a nice place with convenient transportation!", '413711531;2019年2月;如果你在市區專程打車進去來說就是不值,如果想找一間便宜又能拍照這房間就最合適不過了!
房子提供的毛巾只有3條,還有看起來不太乾淨,建議自己帶｡', '323117935;2018年9月;跟男朋友去 就一個房間足夠了 簡單也挺有情調的 這價格不錯啊 喜歡 而且房東很耐心回答態度好', '262753803;2018年5月;整潔,交通方便,裝潢頗有特色']
column18: 无线网络、有线电视、暖气、书桌/工作区域、衣架、除此之外还有13个便利设施

column17:
['424582099;2019年3月;房间很干净,有点洁癖的我都还满意!洗发水沐浴露的牌子都不错,马桶上面也使用了一次性马桶垫!房间里面的很多小细节做的不错,创口贴,梳子,雨伞,针线包都有准备(虽然我没用上)最值得点赞的是离地铁口真的是巨近!推荐一波,值得入住!', '411887928;2019年2月;地理位置很方便出行,靠近地铁口,靠近商圈｡', '406796426;2019年1月;看到下面不好的评价还是有点犹豫!因为需要一张1.8米的床还是预定了!特意咨询了房东!房东说因为拒绝恶意赔偿得到不真实的评价!并保证如果入住房间不好可以退款还免费让我住!入住后确实没有失望,房间,卫生间很干净,床品也非常舒服纯棉的!床1.8米的,我们挤了两个大人一个小孩!有个小阳台可以坐坐!地理位置很好!靠近地铁口万象天地!唯一不足就是厨房没有提供调料,可以改进一下!嘻嘻!推荐', '367506007;2019年1月;房东人很好,房间也不错,值得住的｡', '361210556;2018年12月;第一次在这个平台订住宿,订了两晚,住了一晚就换酒店了,感觉没法住人,也可以理解为我的要求比较高,无奈也不能退款退房,只能浪费一晚,地方很小,厕所非常小,淋浴没有单独空间,就在马桶边上,马桶边上就是洗手台,完全没法洗澡,莲蓬头放点水,整个厕所地面全湿了,能体会当时的奔溃吗?厨房很脏,想放个行李,都感觉不行,整个厨房空间浪费,床不能称为床,就是两个木架子平放上面放个床垫｡｡｡｡被老公骂了,怎么选了这些一个地方,只愿意将就一晚,当晚就订了酒店第二天不住了……被图片骗了,之后都不敢订民宿了｡｡｡｡对了信号也不好', '354561374;2018年12月;谔谔 虽然出了点差错但是房东很热心的解决了 满分服务态度', '333175793;2018年10月;地理位置极其优越
就是拖鞋有异味..?', '327552879;2018年9月;交通很便利,房东很nice', '324376564;2018年9月;离地铁很近,交通方便', '310748320;2018年8月;房子地段非常好,附近就有新开的万象天地,里面吃玩俱全,楼下就有便利店,方便省心｡交通位置优越,地铁和公交车都可以到达｡房东体贴周到｡
', '291522301;2018年7月;交通超级方便!然后房间床会很舒服,房东小姐姐很温柔推荐推荐', '289678955;2018年7月;地理位置一级棒 因为想要方便所以选择在一号线附近 到了之后发现真的距离地铁站一分钟!房间虽然没有想象中那么大 但是住两个人足够了!而且风格也超喜欢!很愉快的住宿体验~', '288866140;2018年7月;房间在深大附近 非常方便 房间也是十分干净整洁 住着还是非常舒服的 喜欢', '286312057;2018年7月;挺不错的 房东很热情', '283978660;2018年7月;地理位置好,配套齐全;舒适温馨,有家的感觉', '282997775;2018年6月;不错', '269796804;2018年5月;我自己也是个民宿房东,所以一个房东是否用心很容易看出来!这已经是我第二次入住,距离之前入住感觉完全不一样!说下我的感受房子重新被屋主设计软装过,之前1.5的床也更换成1.8米的大床一家三口睡着完全不拥挤了,四件套被芯也全部焕然一新!质地很不错同时准备了高低两款枕头!说下其他方面可供其他人参考:1小屋距离地铁站很近步行真的是1分钟可到;2屋主的门锁也安全,密码锁使用很方便同时也安装了防盗门双重保障;3距离购物中心很近步行可到;4去世界之窗也很方便地铁2站;5房子收拾的非常干净屋主很贴心准备了一次性牙刷,洗脸巾!唯一缺陷是厨房没有调料建议可以准备些,嘻嘻!', '258880141;2018年4月;位置很棒,设施齐全!', '237731907;2018年2月;全五星好评 房东消息回应及时 房屋信息描述准确 细致 自助入住很省心 整体是舒心且自由的 交通饮食实在方便 一晚美好的体验', '237173053;2018年2月;性价比奇高!离高新地铁口很近,四通八达｡行程里有宜家,距离宜家打车仅13元车资!一有问题询问房东,立即回复｡房间温馨,整洁,宜家风｡楼下就有面包店,去购物公园,海岸城都很方便｡小区安静,安全｡推荐大家来深圳住这里!', '232030071;2018年2月;地方很好找,虽然入住时遇到了点困难,打电话就搞定了,旁边就是地铁,非常方便,家里很干净,淋雨喷头水很足,停车也免费,不过空调没有制热模式,那几天有点冷｡其它都不错,性价比很高', '231630501;2018年2月;房子很干净,就在万象天地对面,交通和逛街也很方便｡
但是晚上的时候楼层有人养的狗叫,别人以为是我们房间的,就一直在骂人,不知道谁还打了电话过来,当时已经晚上十二点多了,我们第二天要早起,被狗叫吵醒已经很不愉快,不知道谁还打电话过来,当时非常反感｡
希望房东可以改进', '223877436;2018年1月;无论是交通还是逛街都非常方便,体验很好,下次还来,值得大家来感受!好评太赞了', '222527401;2017年12月;房子很不错
方便近地铁
环境氛围很好
很干净~
谢谢美丽的房主~', '216050635;2017年12月;非常便利温馨方便', '215658879;2017年12月;房子的地理位置是无敌好的!地铁,公交,万象,都是超级近的!只是入住时真的很麻烦,我们自驾车,不是打车,也不是地铁,车听到地下停车场,电梯门被锁住,另外的门没有门卡根本进不了,也无法呼叫保安!没有任何的帮助!房东也完全不知道解决方法!我们是刚好遇到人问路才从其他栋楼进去坐电梯上一楼再找到入住的那栋楼!到了房门口,房东留的密码也是错的!还好,房东回复信息是很及时的!如果这样的入住体验已经让人心里大打折扣了!房间布置简洁,还算舒适吧!毕竟一分钱一分货,也不可能要求怎么样!入住后发现没有毛巾和牙刷,入住前也没有说明,所以根本没有准备!我觉得这些问题完全是房东和客人入住前沟通好就能解决的,所以希望你们以后能改进!不是说价格便宜了就随便一点｡', '211005710;2017年11月;真的好棒!!下次住南山区就认这家了!!位置很棒,地铁口一出来就是小区,马路对面就是万象!还有就是,床真的好舒服!布料很软很滑很舒服!', '199460289;2017年10月;这是一间非常温馨的房子,干净整洁,交通便利,去地铁只需要两分钟哦｡去任何地方都非常方便,非常感谢Tina提供这么棒的房子~谢谢~', '196678764;2017年9月;很好的房东', '182154535;2017年8月;因为房东描述的很详尽 完全可以自助入住 信息回的很快 离地铁口真的超级近 出门都很方便 房子麻雀虽小五脏俱全 住的很舒服 而且价格也不是特别贵', '181077959;2017年8月;房子的地理位置不错,离地铁很近,不难找｡房子内部也很舒服,各方面都不错,但隔音有点差,晚上房外的人经过讲话的声音都很大,会听得很清楚…', '180263522;2017年8月;出门离地铁站步行两分钟,很近,很方便｡周边有便利店､餐厅等｡家里很干净也很温馨,布置的风格也很喜欢｡小小的房子却很精致｡', '172836952;2017年7月;很好', '161136643;2017年6月;适合情侣和朋友出游~', '159138876;2017年6月;房子一进去感觉是很喜欢的户型 床也比较大 乐视TV 高速Wifi 只是周围没有大型的商超 买菜做饭不是很方便 然后洗手间挂了一些估计之前的客人留下的毛巾 没有清理 要记得自己带洗漱用具还有浴巾 有洗衣机 床睡的也蛮舒服 
调味品也要自己准备的 最好提前跟房东沟通 我们去的时候就没有油了 房东非常好沟通 很热情 我想下次还会选择再次入住', '156292961;2017年5月;房子不错,靠近地铁口,交通便利｡门口有公交车站,距离南山区的海岸城商业区有20分钟车程,很方便｡', '154719608;2017年5月;小巧的房间,位置很方便,小区看起来也很新｡', '152892791;2017年5月;房间如图所示,只是卫生细节让人不太放心｡落地灯有蜘蛛网,房间里也堆放着房主的东西,浴室里乱七八糟地挂着各种用过的毛巾,浴室里东西放的有点乱有水渍｡那一栋楼里很多这样的公寓,这间胜在稍微有点设计比较温馨｡', '152547265;2017年5月;非常棒!很舒适,有的时候忘了东西呀在房间里,房东很积极的帮忙找回还发了快递,非常nice!', '152118515;2017年5月;房东哥哥帮忙收了五个快递 人很细心认真 没到的快递还打电话给快递员 超有爱 离地铁站超近 走三分钟就能到 地铁很方便 去欢乐谷世界之窗都很方便 下了地铁走几分钟就能到 房间里有冰箱有洗衣机有做饭的厨具 洗澡的东西也很齐全 房间里还有一些小便利贴 贴着注意事项啥的 总之很满意的一次住宿啦 住了三个晚上都感觉蛮不错的~', '150438653;2017年5月;房东服务很好  我们遇到问题她都很耐心回答并且帮助我们', '148069893;2017年4月;好', '147478931;2017年4月;挺好的  性价比很高', '145790708;2017年4月;还是相对不错的', '143887603;2017年4月;Tian的房间超级棒!一切体验都很完美!地理位置优越,环境好,安静,隔音效果好,家里装饰简约不失温馨,设施齐全,总之是超级棒的入住选择｡', '140596281;2017年3月;哈哈哈哈哈哈哈', '139342977;2017年3月;地理位置很棒,门口就是地铁,有任何问题房东都很及时回复｡', '138114098;2017年3月;距离机场和体育馆还是比较近的 还不错哦 就是房间有点小味道 其他都打满分啦', '136315457;2017年3月;房子在地铁站旁边,很方便｡', '136168056;2017年3月;房东很赞,热情又认真,给出路线图,联系方式,还热心的帮助我们存放行李,十分感谢! 房子离地铁站很近,这是姐姐最满意的地方,出地铁站只需要两三分钟就可以进到这栋楼的电梯了,很好找的,房间里冰箱彩电洗衣机都是齐全的,洗发水沐浴露牙膏拖鞋也有,晚上安静好睡觉,早上楼下的招商银行上到二楼去有好多卖吃的商铺,品种又多,又便宜,可怜我们不知道,外面到处找地方吃饭……第三天才发现哈哈哈', '135397410;2017年3月;Tina的房间离地铁站真的真的非常近,一出地铁口走两三分钟就到楼下了｡房间设施齐全又温馨,有一些小植物,整个房间充满了活力｡厨房锅碗瓢盆都很齐,还贴心地配备了柴米油盐酱醋｡整个房间有很多Tina留下来了详细且温馨的便利贴,将各个设施都介绍的非常清楚｡是一次非常棒的体验,希望以后来深圳都能订到你的房间!', '135055193;2017年3月;蛮不错的｡交通方便,房子也好,性价比蛮高的｡', '133500676;2017年2月;房子很可爱 房主对待房客很认真 会好好地解决房客的诸多问题 距离地铁站很近 出行非常方便 房间内各种用品很齐全 居住的时候也非常方便', '132272530;2017年2月;房子位置离地铁站不能更近,出行非常方便~房间小而温馨,体验不错☺️', '128846100;2017年1月;非常的棒~找不到位置也会很热情的指出~希望下次还可以来~', '128206060;2017年1月;总体还挺好的,也比较卫生安全', '127391359;2017年1月;环境很好,布置很温馨,给人一种家的感觉,交通也很方便,一出门就是地铁站｡', '125285825;2017年1月;房子很温馨,很棒的体验!', '123164802;2016年12月;位置很好,而且设备很齐全舒适,询问房东的时候也回答得很仔细
一次很愉快的入住呢~', '120003393;2016年12月;房源离地铁站非常近出行方便,温馨的小家~特别适合小情侣,沙发,书桌还有厨房设施齐全,我们都非常期待有机会再次入住~', '116863289;2016年12月;很棒的房子很温暖有礼貌的房东哦', '113478482;2016年11月;非常好的房源', '111595955;2016年11月;在沙发上吃了个饭,我和朋友身上都被咬了很多红色的小点,很痒｡没能继续住就换地方走了', '108896863;2016年10月;非常温馨,像自己家…
第一次,也是一次完美的民宿体验｡
以后来深圳还住这儿', '106401794;2016年10月;Tian的小屋在地铁站边上的高层公寓里头,交通非常便利;楼下有个叫yomi+的面包房,还有Pacific Coffee,和朋友在那边吃吃点心喝喝咖啡聊聊天很不错｡这高层公寓位于深圳高新科技产业园区,周边的城市建设正在进行和完善,相信不久的将来会为这片区域的居住者也会给入住Tian的小屋的人们带去更多便利｡小屋布置简洁而温馨,也具备几乎所有能像在家一般生活的设施,东西不贵更不是名品大牌,却处处显出Tian的用心｡它其实就是简单而不失情调的真实生活｡晚上我把床头的落地灯打开开,柔和的灯光洒满小屋,然后坐在小沙发上,看看书或看看电视,间或跟同伴闲聊几句,有一搭没一搭,还有徐徐的晚风吹进,感觉挺惬意｡小屋很适合两个小伙伴或小情侣入住,放松放松,把它完全当作你们这短暂旅程的家吧｡小家很好｡谢谢Tian提供这么一处旅途上的“家”｡祝福Tian,祝好!再见吧!:)', '106054800;2016年10月;超级好的住宿体验!让我对深圳整个城市的印象都加了好多分!特别是室内的装修,感觉就是理想中生活的样子!说点有用的:离地铁口特别特别近但要记得是新城花园不要走错,密码门很方便阳光很好,打开的第一眼阳光洒满了整个房间太温暖了!还要特别表扬淋浴的花洒头太给力了!洗澡像是在spa!整套房子户型也很舒服要啥有啥!临走前拍了好多照片想要记住这美好的体验~唯一遗憾的就是因为没和房东住一起所以交流不多,但感觉房东人超级nice很有生活品味,希望之后还有机会交流!',
